atk-abh03a28:2_0: 654-657. Idāni kappaṭṭhakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṁ ‘‘saṅghaṁ samaggaṁ bhetvāna,
atk-abh03a28:2_1: kappaṁ nirayamhi paccatī’’ti ‘‘sakalampi kappaṁ saṅghabhedako niraye tiṭṭhatī’’ti
atk-abh03a28:2_2: laddhi, seyyathāpi rājagirikānaṁ; te sandhāya kappaṭṭhoti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā
atk-abh03a28:2_3: itarassa. Buddho ca loketi idaṁ vinā buddhuppādena saṅghabhedassa abhāvadassanatthaṁ
atk-abh03a28:2_4: vuttaṁ. Kappo ca saṇṭhāti saṅgho ca bhijjatītiādi ‘‘yadi so sakalaṁ kappaṁ tiṭṭhati,
atk-abh03a28:2_5: saṇṭhahanato paṭṭhāya taṁ kammaṁ katvā tattha uppajjitvā tiṭṭheyyā’’ti dassetuṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a28:2_6: Atītantiādi heṭṭhā vuttādhippāyameva. Kappaṭṭho iddhimāti pañhe bhāvanāmayaṁ sandhāya
atk-abh03a28:2_7: paṭikkhipati, parasamaye panassa jātimayaṁ iddhiṁ icchanti, taṁ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a28:2_8: Chandiddhipādotiādi ‘‘jātimayāya iddhiyā iddhimāti laddhimattametaṁ, kiṁ tena, yadi
atk-abh03a28:2_9: panassa iddhi atthi, iminā nayena iddhipādā bhāvitā bhaveyyu’’nti codanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a28:2_10: Āpāyiko nerayikoti suttaṁ yaṁ so ekaṁ kappaṁ asītibhāge katvā tato ekabhāgamattaṁ
atk-abh03a28:2_11: kālaṁ tiṭṭheyya, taṁ āyukappaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ, tasmā asādhakanti.
atk-abh03a28:5_0: 658-659. Idāni kusalapaṭilābhakathā nāma hoti. Tattha kappaṭṭho sakasamaye kāmāvacarakusalameva
atk-abh03a28:5_1: paṭilabhati. Yena pana taṁ upapattiṁ paṭibāheyya, taṁ mahaggataṁ lokuttaraṁ vā na
atk-abh03a28:5_2: paṭilabhati. Yesaṁ pana imaṁ vibhāgaṁ akatvā aviseseneva ‘‘so kusalacittaṁ na paṭilabhatī’’ti
atk-abh03a28:5_3: laddhi, seyyathāpi uttarāpathakānaṁ; tesaṁ vibhāgadassanena taṁ laddhiṁ bhindituṁ
atk-abh03a28:5_4: pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a28:8_0: 660-662. Idāni anantarāpayuttakathā nāma hoti. Tattha anantarāpayutto nāma yena khandhabhedato
atk-abh03a28:8_1: anantarā vipākadāyakaṁ mātughātādi ānantariyakammaṁ āṇattaṁ. Tattha yassa niyatāya
atk-abh03a28:8_2: āṇattiyā āṇatto taṁ kammaṁ karissati, so atthasādhikāya cetanāya uppāditattā micchattaniyato
atk-abh03a28:8_3: hoti, abhabbo sammattaniyāmaṁ okkamituṁ. Yassa aniyatāya āṇattiyā āṇatto taṁ kammaṁ
atk-abh03a28:8_4: karissati, so atthasādhikāya cetanāya anuppāditattā na micchattaniyato, bhabbo sammattaniyāmaṁ
atk-abh03a28:8_5: okkamitunti idaṁ sakasamaye sanniṭṭhānaṁ. Yesaṁ pana ‘‘aniyatāyapi āṇattiyā abhabboyeva
atk-abh03a28:8_6: sammattaniyāmaṁ okkamitu’’nti laddhi, seyyathāpi uttarāpathakānaṁ; tesaṁ taṁ laddhiṁ
atk-abh03a28:8_7: bhindituṁ sakavādī pubbapakkhaṁ datvā anantarāpayuttoti paravādinā attānaṁ pucchāpeti.
atk-abh03a28:8_8: Tenettha paṭhamapucchā paravādissa, atthasādhikacetanāya abhāvaṁ sandhāya paṭiññā
atk-abh03a28:8_9: sakavādissa. Tato paravādī mātughātādikammassa āṇattattāva ‘‘so micchattaniyato’’ti
atk-abh03a28:8_10: maññati. Tasmā micchattaniyāmañcāti pañhaṁ pucchati. Sakavādī pana ekassa puggalassa
atk-abh03a28:8_11: dvinnaṁ niyāmānaṁ anokkantimattameva sandhāya na hevanti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a28:9_0: Nanu taṁ kammanti mātughātādikammaṁ. Tattha aniyatāṇattiṁ sandhāya ‘‘āmantā’’ti paṭiññā
atk-abh03a28:9_1: sakavādissa. Aniyatampi hi āṇattiṁ payojetvā ṭhitassa ‘‘ananucchavikaṁ mayā kata’’nti
atk-abh03a28:9_2: kukkuccaṁ uppajjateva, vippaṭisāro jāyateva. Hañcītiādi kukkuccuppattimattaṁ gahetvā
atk-abh03a28:10_0: 661. Idāni yassa aniyatāṇattikassāpi anantarāpayuttassa paravādinā sammattaniyāmokkamanaṁ
atk-abh03a28:10_1: paṭisiddhaṁ, tameva puggalaṁ gahetvā anantarāpayuttopuggalo abhabboti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a28:10_2: attano laddhivasena paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṁ sakavādī ‘‘abhabbo nāma mātughātādikammānaṁ
atk-abh03a28:10_3: kārako, kiṁ te tena tāni kammāni katānī’’ti codetuṁ mātā jīvitā voropitātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a28:10_4: Itaro tesaṁ vatthūnaṁ arogatāya tathārūpaṁ kiriyaṁ apassanto ‘‘na heva’’nti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a28:11_0: Taṁ kammaṁ paṭisaṁharitvāti aniyatāṇattikammaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ. Tañhi ‘‘mā kho mayā
atk-abh03a28:11_1: āṇattaṁ ākāsī’’ti āṇattaṁ nivārentena paṭisaṁhaṭaṁ nāma hoti. Paṭisaṁhaṭattāyeva
atk-abh03a28:11_2: cettha kukkuccaṁ paṭivinoditaṁ, vippaṭisāro paṭivinīto nāma hoti. Evaṁ santepi panettha
atk-abh03a28:11_3: purimāṇattiyāyeva niyatabhāvaṁ maññamāno paravādī ‘‘āmantā’’ti paṭijānāti. Atha naṁ
atk-abh03a28:11_4: sakavādī tassa kammassa paṭisaṁhaṭabhāvaṁ sampaṭicchāpetvā attano laddhiṁ patiṭṭhāpetvā hañcītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a28:12_0: 662. Puna anantarāpayuttoti pariyosānapañhe paṭhamapañhe viya pucchā paravādissa,
atk-abh03a28:12_1: paṭiññā sakavādissa. Nanu taṁ kammanti anuyogo paravādissa, paṭisaṁhaṭakālato pubbe
atk-abh03a28:12_2: payuttakālaṁ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādissa. Payuttapubbatāmattaṁ gahetvā aniyatāṇattivasena
atk-abh03a28:12_3: hañcīti laddhipatiṭṭhāpanaṁ paravādissa. Ayaṁ pana laddhi ayoniso patiṭṭhitattā appatiṭṭhitāva hotīti.
atk-abh03a28:15_0: 663-664. Idāni niyatassa niyāmakathā nāma hoti. Tattha duvidho niyāmo – micchattaniyāmo
atk-abh03a28:15_1: ca ānantariyakammaṁ, sammattaniyāmo ca ariyamaggo. Ime dve niyāme ṭhapetvā añño niyāmo
atk-abh03a28:15_2: nāma natthi. Sabbepi hi sesā tebhūmakadhammā aniyatā nāma. Tehi samannāgatopi aniyatoyeva.
atk-abh03a28:15_3: Buddhehi pana attano ñāṇabalena ‘‘ayaṁ satto anāgate bodhiṁ pāpuṇissatī’’ti byākato
atk-abh03a28:15_4: bodhisatto puññussadattā niyatoti vuccati. Iti imaṁ vohāramattaṁ gahetvā ‘‘pacchimabhaviko
atk-abh03a28:15_5: bodhisatto tāya jātiyā bhabbo dhammaṁ abhisametu’’nti adhippāyena ‘‘niyato niyāmaṁ
atk-abh03a28:15_6: okkamatī’’ti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi pubbaseliyāparaseliyānaṁ; te sandhāya pucchā
atk-abh03a28:15_7: sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Micchattaniyatotiādi aññena niyāmena niyatassa aññaniyāmābhāvadassanatthaṁ
atk-abh03a28:15_8: vuttaṁ. Pubbe maggaṁ bhāvetvātiādi niyāmappabhedadassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ. Satipaṭṭhānantiādi
atk-abh03a28:15_9: ekasmimpi niyāme dhammappabhedadassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ. Bhabbo bodhisattoti vacanaṁ kevalaṁ
atk-abh03a28:15_10: bodhisattassa bhabbataṁ dīpeti, na niyatassa niyāmokkamanaṁ, tasmā asādhakaṁ. So
atk-abh03a28:15_11: hi pubbe ekenapi niyatadhammena aniyato bodhimūle saccadassanena niyāmaṁ okkantoti.
atk-abh03a28:18_0: 665-667. Idāni nivutakathā nāma hoti. Tattha suddhassa suddhakiccābhāvato nīvaraṇehi
atk-abh03a28:18_1: nivuto ophuṭo pariyonaddho ca nīvaraṇaṁ jahatīti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi uttarāpathakānaṁ;
atk-abh03a28:18_2: te sandhāya nivutotipucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Ratto rāgantiādi nivutassa
atk-abh03a28:18_3: nīvaraṇajahane dosadassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ. Parisuddhe pariyodātetiādi vikkhambhanavisuddhiyā
atk-abh03a28:18_4: visuddhassa samucchedavisuddhidassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ. Tassa evaṁ jānatotiādi jānato
atk-abh03a28:18_5: passato āsavakkhayaṁ dīpeti, na nivutassa nīvaraṇajahanaṁ, tasmā asādhakanti.
atk-abh03a28:21: 668-670. Idāni sammukhībhūtakathā nāma hoti. Tattha sammukhībhūtoti saṁyojanānaṁ sammukhībhāvaṁ tehi samaṅgībhāvaṁ upagato. Sesamettha nivutakathāsadisamevāti.
atk-abh03a28:24_0: 671-673. Idāni samāpanno assādetītikathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja
atk-abh03a28:24_1: viharati, so tadassādetī’’tiādivacanaṁ (a. ni. 4.123) nissāya ‘‘samāpanno assādeti,
atk-abh03a28:24_2: sā cassa jhānanikanti jhānārammaṇā hotī’’ti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṁ,
atk-abh03a28:24_3: te sandhāya samāpannoti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Taṁ jhānaṁ tassa jhānassa
atk-abh03a28:24_4: ārammaṇanti pañhesu tasseva tadārammaṇataṁ apassanto suttavirodhabhayena paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a28:24_5: ‘‘tadassādetī’’tivacanamattena paṭijānāti. So tadassādetīti suttaṁ jhānalābhino jhānā
atk-abh03a28:24_6: vuṭṭhāya jhānassādaṁ sādheti, na antosamāpattiyaṁyeva jhānanikantiyā jhānārammaṇataṁ, tasmā asādhakanti.
atk-abh03a28:27_0: 674. Idāni asātarāgakathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘yaṁkiñci vedanaṁ vedeti sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ
atk-abh03a28:27_1: vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā, so taṁ vedanaṁ abhinandati abhivadatī’’ti (ma. ni. 1.409)
atk-abh03a28:27_3: rāgassādavasena abhinandanā hoti. Tasmā atthi asātarāgo’’ti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi
atk-abh03a28:27_4: uttarāpathakānaṁ; te sandhāya atthi asātarāgoti pucchā sakavādissa. Tattha asātarāgoti
atk-abh03a28:27_5: asāte dukkhavedayite ‘‘aho vata me etadeva bhaveyyā’’ti rajjanā. Āmantāti laddhivasena
atk-abh03a28:28_0: 675.So taṁ vedanaṁ abhinandatīti sutte pana vinivaṭṭetvā dukkhavedanameva ārabbha
atk-abh03a28:28_1: rāguppatti nāma natthi, samūhaggahaṇena pana vedayitalakkhaṇaṁ dhammaṁ dukkhavedanameva
atk-abh03a28:28_2: vā attato samanupassanto diṭṭhimaññanāsaṅkhātāya diṭṭhābhinandanāya vedanaṁ abhinandati,
atk-abh03a28:28_3: dukkhāya vedanāya vipariṇāmaṁ abhinandati, dukkhāya vedanāya abhibhūto tassā paṭipakkhaṁ
atk-abh03a28:28_4: kāmasukhaṁ patthayantopi dukkhavedanaṁ abhinandati nāma. Evaṁ dukkhavedanāya abhinandanā
atk-abh03a28:31_0: 676-680. Idāni dhammataṇhā abyākatātikathā nāma hoti. Tattha rūpataṇhā…pe… dhammataṇhāti
atk-abh03a28:31_1: imāsu chasu taṇhāsu yasmā sabbapacchimā taṇhā dhammataṇhāti vuttā, tasmā sā abyākatāti
atk-abh03a28:31_2: yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi pubbaseliyānaṁ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā
atk-abh03a28:31_3: itarassa. Sesapañhānaṁ pāḷiyā attho niyyāti. Kāmataṇhātiādīhi tīhi koṭṭhāsehi chapi
atk-abh03a28:31_4: taṇhā saṅkhipitvā dassitā. Rūpādīsu hi chasu ārammaṇesu kāmassādavasena pavattā taṇhā
atk-abh03a28:31_5: kāmataṇhā. ‘‘Bhavissati attā ca loko cā’’ti sassatadiṭṭhisahagatā taṇhā bhavataṇhā.
atk-abh03a28:31_6: ‘‘Na bhavissatī’’ti ucchedadiṭṭhisahagatā taṇhā vibhavataṇhāti. Nanu sā dhammataṇhāti
atk-abh03a28:31_7: padaṁ taṇhāya dhammārammaṇaṁ ārabbha pavattiṁ dīpeti, na abyākatabhāvaṁ tasmā asādhakanti.
atk-abh03a28:34_0: 681-685. Idāni dhammataṇhā nadukkhasamudayotikathā nāma hoti. Tatrāpi yasmā sā dhammataṇhāti
atk-abh03a28:34_1: vuttā, tasmā na dukkhasamudayoti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi pubbaseliyānaṁyeva; te
atk-abh03a28:34_2: sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesaṁ purimakathāsadisamevāti.
